item.title: The plane with Manu Samoa
item.description: A little bonus on the flight back: Samoan national rugby team, the mighty Manu Samoa, flies with the same plane as we do.

item.title: The story behind the story
item.description: Or why the hell is this article published so late...

item.title: Manono Island
item.description: Alaimoana and Lise drive us personally to the wharf for Manono Island.
